question: If a person is not satisfied with the decision passed by the Banking Ombudsman, he/ she can approach the appellate authority against the Banking Ombudsmenâ€™s decision. The Appellate Authority is vested in which among the following?
option1: Managing Director of the Concerned Bank
option2: Governor of Reserve Bank of India
option3: Deputy Governor of Reserve Bank of India
option4: High Court of the state in which Bank Branch is located
answer: Deputy Governor of Reserve Bank of India
